name: Old Storyteller
dialogue: Have you heard the tale of the dream eater?

From how the story goes. A walk in the woods late at night. If you don't freeze to death you will quickly see the darkness build below the ice. What looks like a shadow from a beast above is actually a mouth that shallows you whole.
lore: The darkness comes from the cold.

name: Mysterious Wanderer
dialogue: I've seen things in the mountains you wouldn't believe.
lore: Shadows move in the peaks, unseen by most.

name: Drunk Mercenary
dialogue: Lost me blade to a blasted wolf!
Reckon you could get it back?
